name: Nimbus Tower
description:
Nimbus Tower is a short platformer game set on a magical world of floating islands.  Your flying boat crashes into a mysterious tower and you'll have to find a way to escape... As you explore the islands you'll find new abilities that will grant you access to the other areas of the map.

Approximate gameplay time: 20-30 minutes.

Credits:

Programming, Music & Sound:  Pere Dolcet

Art & Idea: Pere Dolcet, Fausto Romano, Liam Viladiu
